content.query:
IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'sudis-synapse-course-cosmos-db'))
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [sudis-synapse-course-cosmos-db]
    WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = 'Wre4gUxlfJkkUHkP5Wlg1YT5XuNnTmpU4PGNXmnapTdje9PvxxjGF84HpW4VvXYL3x9tF9oJOL0r4hbT4kHc1Q=='
GO
---- select query on CosmosDB
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=sudis-synapse-course-cosmos-db;Database=nyctaxidb',
                OBJECT = 'Heartbeat',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'sudis-synapse-course-cosmos-db'
) AS [Heartbeat]
